net.vz.mongodb.jackson
Class MongoDBTestBase

java.lang.Object
  net.vz.mongodb.jackson.MongoDBTestBase
Direct Known Subclasses:
TestDBCursor, TestDBQuery, TestDBRefHandling, TestDBUpdate, TestIdAnnotatedClass, TestJacksonDBCollection, TestJsonViews, TestMapReduce, TestObjectIdHandling, TestParsingAndGenerating, TestWriteResult
public abstract class MongoDBTestBase
extends Object

Base class for unit tests that run against MongoDB. Assumes there is a MongoDB instance listening on the default port on localhost, and that we can do whatever we want to a database called "unittest".
